channel.title: Need help with castle wars

item.title: Need help with castle wars
item.dc:creator: @mr_dope mr dope
item.description:
@mr_dope wrote:

that wouldn’t work. He said that he’s tried deleting all the if statements so its just one statement with no requirements. Therefore if it didn’t work like that, then either the stair is messed up, or he has the wrong id for the stairs.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with castle wars
item.dc:creator: @Bill1 Bill_
item.description:
@Bill1 wrote:

Your using just an else command. Ignore the other kids above this post

If(statement = = true) {
//do stuff
} else {
sM("noob");
}

An else is used almost as an otherwise. If the statement is true, do this otherwise send message noob.

An else if (which is appalling Java btw, you should hardly ever use else if) is just another statement, but please remove the else because no real coder would write a statement like that.

Use it like

if(isTrue) {
//doshit
}
//next statement
If(isK) {
}
else //but what if he isn't k?
{
sM("umad? Go k");
}

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with castle wars
item.dc:creator: @greendrag200 greendrag200
item.description:
@greendrag200 wrote:

Hey guys, so lately I've been working on a fully working castle wars for an Allstar source.  I got to a point where I have no idea what to do though and I need some help.  Something is wrong with the 3rd stairs(the one leading to flag) in the sara base among like 2 in the zammy base.  Here's the code I made:

case 4417: //Sara Base Stairs (Up) if (absX == 2419 && absY == 3077) //works { teleportToX = 2420; teleportToY = 3080; heightLevel = 1; } else if (absX == 2427 && absY == 3081) //works { teleportToX = 2430; teleportToY = 3080; heightLevel = 2; } else// if (absX == 2425 && absY == 3077) //doesn't work { //teleportToX = 2426; //teleportToY = 3074; //heightLevel = 3; sendMessage("Testing"); } break;

Those coords are not off, I’ve checked about 5 times. Also,I’ve tried deleting the if statements and just making it send a message so I know if it even works, and it doesn’t. It is showing the same id as the other two stairs so Idk the problem

Please help

Read full topic
